textBeforeTable: Indicative . red   The irregular conjugations of this verb are in &nbspvalido Participle: &nbspvaliendo Gerund: Verb Conjugations for valer 'valgo' in our machine translators Collins Complete Spanish Electronic Dictionary © HarperCollins Publishers 2011 he can't look after himself o manage on his own no puede valerse por sí mismo no se vale solo es muy mayor, pero todavía se vale she is very old, but she can still do things for herself (arreglárselas) 2 se valió de su cargo para conseguir la información she used her position to obtain the information se valió del derecho al veto para frenar el acuerdo he made use of o exercised his veto to put a stop to the agreement; se valió de un bastón para cruzar el río he used a cane to get across the river; to use [+amistad, influencia] (aprovecharse de)
